name: This Life Escapes Me
description:
You are brought back to life for one final hour by a troubled necromancer. He cautiously swears he's from your past. Spend your final moments putting you and the matter to rest.

This is a ten-minute, linear visual novel made with Ren'Py featuring the use of the 3D camera function, developed in a week for the O2A2 Jam of 2020. Please note that Ren'Py web builds are currently in beta, so performance may be slow.

Team:

  • Writer, Character Artist, and Director - Coda
  • Programming - BaiYu
  • Background Art - NiAsobu
